Uses of Class
atomica.logic.pathfinding.Path

Packages that use Path
atomica.logic Provides model classes with application logic. 
atomica.logic.pathfinding Provides model classes for finding the shortest path in a game situation. 
 

Uses of Path in atomica.logic
 

Methods in atomica.logic that return Path
 Path Game.findShortestPath(Field from, Field to)
          Finds the shortest Path between the two Fields considering blocked Fields by Atoms.
 

Uses of Path in atomica.logic.pathfinding
 

Methods in atomica.logic.pathfinding that return Path
 Path PathFinder.findShortestPath(GameSituation gameSituation, Field fromField, Field toField)
          Finds the shortest path from the starting field (fromField) to the destination field (toField).
